Name: Seraph of the Eternal Flame
Story Background: Seraph of the Eternal Flame is a celestial being born from the essence of a dying star. It descends upon the mortal realm to bring hope and protection to those in need.
Ability: Radiant Aura - Whenever Seraph of the Eternal Flame attacks, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Appearance Description: Seraph of the Eternal Flame is a majestic angel with fiery wings that span the sky. Its radiant armor glows with the intensity of a blazing inferno, and its eyes emit a warm, comforting light.
